content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, going from one barracks to another, at goose air base, newfoundland/labrador/canada.  it was completely dark.  the temperature outside was 20 degrees below zero.  out of the corner of my eye, something in the sky caught my eye. 

there was this object going from nw to se, very high and very large, and the best way i can describe it is like looking at a basketball, tumbling and wobbling through the air, with a dozen holes in it, and smoke coming out of every hole.  behind it, stretching about half-way to the horizon, was a luminous trail, which disappeared slowly as the object traveled across the sky.  there was absolutely no sound.

i stood there watching this object for as long as could stand it in that intense cold, about twenty minutes, before going inside.  i saw only one other person outside during this observation, and i said, "do you see that?"  he answered, "yes, i do, but i don't want to."

there was no report of this object the next day, and no one has ever offered me an explanation as to what it was.

the sky was clear, and stars could be seen.  when i went inside, the object was still in the sky and still moving across it.  there were no lights on the object.
content.summary: Observed an object going through the air, emitting smoke, and tumbling.

content.detailedDescription:
I was called by my boyfriend to step outside to witness several aircraft flying in formation and emitting unusual contrails. i had my camcorder nearby and decided to film them. after reviewing the footage i noticed a small object briefly move through the left side of the screen. my camcorder was at maximum zoom at the time, so this object was at the same altitude or higher than the aircraft formation. 

the attached video shows the aircraft contrails and the small flying object. i have reviewed this footage several times and you can see that the object clearly makes a turn to the left. it also appears to pulsate.
content.summary: Object caught on tape while observing aircraft formation *smaller sized file*

content.detailedDescription:
I was called by my boyfriend to step outside to witness several aircraft flying in formation and emitting unusual contrails. i had my camcorder nearby and decided to film them.  after reviewing the footage i noticed a small object briefly move through the left side of the screen. my camcorder was at maximum zoom at the time, so this object was at the same altitude or higher than the aircraft formation. 

the attached video shows the aircraft contrails and the small flying object. i have reviewed this footage several times and you can see that the object clearly makes a turn to the left. it also appears to pulsate.
content.summary: Object caught on tape while observing aircraft formation

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=o4avamg_7bo

watch this film on youtube, what you see there has been going on for several months outside my house about 3-5 miles from where i live, i have filled reports to the norwegian ufo community, but they don't seem to take it serious, i'm a former private pilot so know most of the lights in the sky, theese lights are not from a normal known aircraft, i don't have video camera, and don't need it, the ufo or what we should call it shows up several times in a week, one night they hang in the skies for more than 3 hours, to me it looks like theese objects are "talking" to each other, if you are an expert on ufo's please feel free to contact me on mailadress           torbenfoxy@hotmail.Com      , because i would like to know more about theese light, at my place they allways shows up one and one, in 30 minutes they are making triangles and other shapes in the air, the altitude of theese objects is different, and sometimes they are very close to our property, i live out on the country, and have nearly 100 % free view 360 degrees up in the sky, my wife said i was stupid until she saw the show one evening, theese objects don't make any sound at all, and are changing colors in different speeds and patterns
i live about 50 miles from oslo, i know more people around norway, have sen the same thing.

hope to get contact with people who knows something about thees lights

best regards torben norway
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Obama ufo's in oslo norway

content.detailedDescription:
These are the same lights i've been reporting for the past two weeks...

last night i saw 3 separate ones  hovering around, i konw the weren't stars  because they were moving in big up and down motions and one of them  was flying  diagonally in circles...     i didn't stare at them too long  because it was very late and i'm   cautious about these lights....
content.summary: 3 different bright/pulsating lights in rockland.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my kitchen looking south out the window, when i saw these really bright, flashing lights hovering in the sky. there were about 3 or 4 individual objects, each hovering and rotating around a central object, which was the brightest of them all. the lights on the object flashed orange, blue, green, and red on each object, and the back of the objects were two, very bright circular lights. each object would travel away from the central object left or right, then return to the central object and rotate, and repeat the action for about 30 minutes. i called my dad over to look at it, and he said he had no idea what it could be. my dad is a big aircraft lover, so his confusion as to what it could be shocked me. other planes passed it like it wasn't even there. i was shocked and confused when i saw the objects and i was also somewhat frightened. this was the 5th time i've seen the objects. the objects all left to the east after about 30 minutes. the objects only appear on very clear, cool nights between about 7 and 8 pm.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: About 4 extremely bright unknown objects hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the atlantic city expressway, towards atlantic city, about 15 miles out.  straight out the windshield, my friend and i noticed a strobe light at about 25 degrees in the sky.  it was similar to an airplane's anti-collision strobe but more intense, plus it just flashed just off and on, unlike a patterned sequence.  it was traveling slowly left to right in the sky, then made an abrupt stop and started to reverse course.  about 10 seconds after the direction change back to the left and staying level, the light just went out and did not return.  we were traveling on a straight section of highway, so the cars movement did not cause the object to change position in the sky.  i know there's an airport and a military base in the area and i always look to the sky when i am outside and i have never seen an odd thing like this before.
content.summary: Flashing light in sky, reverse course, then vanishes.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was driving to work in the morning going down i-83 towards baltimore at approximately the timonium exit. off to my left sorta low in the sky was the object.

2. what made you first notice the object?
it was bright and i was adjusting my visor because of the sun and noticed the object. it was not the sun. this was much smaller. a small bright dot in the sky.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
when i saw this object i thought right away it might be a ufo becuase it was different from anything else i have ever seen.

4.) describe the object and its actions and motions.
it was a bright white light in the sky that looked to be pulsating and spinning. it seemed to be maintining its position in the sky. 

5.) describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i was very interested in the object because it was so different. it looked like it was on fire and spinning. the light was very bright.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
the road sloped down hill and i was unable to see the object.
content.summary: It was a bright white light in the sky that looked to be pulsating and spinning.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 0015 hours i witnessed an orange light travelling below 30,000 feet moving at what i believe to be a higher rate of speed than mach 1.

i did not hear a sonic boom.  i did see a light trail following behind the object.

the light of the object was orange (as was the light trail). 

the light source appeared to be self contained, (like a light from a man made aircraft) unlike a chemical reaction to heat or incendiary light source, as is common with a "shooting star."

the light trail was very faint and was large, but difficult to estimate the length of...But i would say that it was about three fingers wide at arms length...Again below 30,000 feet and probably below 20,000 feet judging on it's brightness.

the object was moving from the sw to the ne.  the angle of this movement across a map from the directions listed was approximately; moving towards the east at about 35 to 40 degrees; moving from the west from about 215 to 220 degrees.

i lost view of the craft, or "light" after about 8 seconds, as it passed below the tree line of my view.
content.summary: Appeared to be a self illuminating light moving rapidly and leaving a light tail

content.detailedDescription:
They arived around 6:30 pm it was cold rainy outside i knew they had come beacuse they told me telephaticly.They told me to go outside and i did we observed eachother for a few seconds then i got bored and went inside.Onother time it moved for 3-4 seconds then turn to light speed



i'm sending this because i'm curious to know what i am. he told me they are always aroud me and i always hear the same one teaching me things,emotionaly,human histoy,technology,how to fly them but i trully dont undurstand i looked up ufo abduction cases and the abductees described the ship's interiors the way my father,he what ever it is, it told mehow the ships looked like or built inside but nothing too drastic



please email me-and thats all you'll 

and if try to contact my email has the wrong info so they can't find me

please do email me i'm not playing a joke on you.
content.summary: Circular,red dots around the disk

They arived around 6:30 pm it was cold rainy outside i knew they had come beacuse they told me telephaticly.They told me to go outside and i did we observed eachother for a few seconds then i got bored and went inside.Onother time it moved for 3-4 seconds then turn to light speed



i'm sending this because i'm curious to know what i am. he told me they are always aroud me and i always hear the same one teaching me things,emotionaly,human histoy,technology,how to fly them but i trully dont undurstand i looked up ufo abduction cases and the abductees described the ship's interiors the way my father,he what ever it is, it told mehow the ships looked like or built inside but nothing too drastic



please email me-and thats all you'll 

and if try to contact my email has the wrong info so they can't find me

please do email me i'm not playing a joke on you.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling west on highway 90, at forty miles an hour, inside the city limits of crestview. i had just passed the city park when something to the north at an angle of 30 degrees above me, and at four or five hundred feet, caught my eye. the sky was clear, the temperature was about 60 degrees. the object was black, appeared to be round, and i had the impression that it was very heavy. i thought at first that i was seeing two aircraft in close flight, then i realized this was not the case. i would guess the size of the thing was at least 25 to 30 feet across. there were many protrusions around the base.  i know this sounds nuts, but my next thought was of some kind of device out of science fiction, with all those protrubances and convolutions around its side. sticking straight up from its top surface, at least 30 feet, was a forest of shapes, one at the outer edge looked like half of an aircraft wing with a small fuel pod on the end. 
its flight path was northwest and straight and level. after a few seconds it passed beyond some trees and i attempted to turn on a side street and follow, but it quickly went out of sight. it was not moving fast. perhaps at the speed of a light plane. there was absolutly no sound. there were no reports, as far as i know, of anyone else seeing the thing.
i was calmly excited. i didn't have any strange sensations and don't have a desire to put tin foil on my head. i believe myself to be of average levelheadness and not prone to seeing the virgin mary in the cornbread.
as so many others have stated:'i know what i saw!'
content.summary: Very black, thick round object with vertical devices with one in particular higher than the others.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was very brief, lasting only a few seconds.  on tuesday afternoon, december 1 i was driving north on highway 78 from daleyville, wisconsin toward mount horeb, wisconsin.  it was a beautiful, sunny day.  the sky was blue with a few white clouds.  everything was still green at that time, as we had not yet had snow.

this stretch of road is very scenic, with rolling hills and farm fields.  as i was driving, i occasionally glanced out the front passenger window to my right to look at the scenery.  during one of these glimpses, something in the sky caught my attention.  i only saw it for an instant.  my first thought was "that's awfully low to be a plane, even a small plane."  as i was thinking that, the object disappeared.  it didn't fly off - it just disappeared.  my sighting was very brief, but my impression is that it was either cigar-shaped or that it was a disc and i was looking at it edge on.  it was a silvery metallic color, and very bright and shiny.  the sun was shining, and appeared to reflect off of the object.

i pulled over as soon as i could do so safely, within 30 seconds, to see if the object was still in the sky.  it wasn't.  if it had been a plane, i should still have been able to see it in the distance.  the disappearance of the object was so instantaneous that i had the impression that it was "cloaked" or was "dyed to match" the color of the sky.

my initial reaction was, "what did i see?���  i can't say for sure what i saw, because the sighting was so brief.  very frustrating.
content.summary: Very bright, shiny metallic silver object in sky over farm fields

content.detailedDescription: at my home on thanksgiving early evening i stepped out on my front steps for a breath of fresh air. the weather was calm and quiet i live in a rural area and could hear and see cars driving a couple miles away. looking off my steps facing southwest i can see schriever afb clearly 15 or so miles away.About halfway between my house and schriever i saw two bright lights moving in unison. they were not very high in the sky and not moving very fast.They headed east and then turned south, staying an equal distance from one another which is what attracted my attention. i found it very strange that even though the distance between them was a mile or so the way they turned in unison seemed strange. as i watched them for maybe two or three minutes while they were headed east i thought, well maybe its common air traffic. there were no blinking lights normally associated with the air craft flying around el paso county. then i realized i heard no noise. i quickly called my wife and son to come look.They did. my son was hanging on the door jam looking when the door swung closed on his fingers. he let out a yell and ran in the house. my wife hot on his tail. that shortened their viewing time to 30 seconds or so. i took a step or two into the house and asked (is he ok) yes they replied. i stepped back out on the steps and saw them turn south. again no noise. on still nights i can hear planes at any altitude. i can even hear the lions in the lion refuge over the hill around three or four miles away roaring. that is an example of how quiet it is out here on the plains. anyway, they were silent. the lights grew closer, they were a mile or two off the ground and a few miles away and began to turn south. the way they turned in unison was unlike any aircraft i have ever seen. living in el paso county i have seen every type of aircraft fly around this area from the flight for life to stealth fighter and bomber. all air craft that low in the county have flashing lights or headlights on at night. these two lights were a constant white. even when they turned south away from me the light was constant. after that they flew out of sight behind my many trees. my son called my daughter on the phone a little while later who was visiting her friend about 6 miles to the south of me. he told her what we had seen and to my amazement she stated she also had been outside and had seen the lights. i have never reported anything like this before. i can barely type and i am a construction worker not a computer person. this took me forever to type with one finger. i feel this was a legitimate sighting and am typing this regardless. during the sighting i felt excited i knew this was my best sighting. after that i debated myself about reporting this. i believe the government monitors these reports and are well aware of ufo activity. i also believe disclosure may not be an option due to the fact murders have been committed in the name of national security in an attempt to silence the truth. for example what happened to the nurse who was the coroners girlfriend at roswell? i believe in ufos easily, i am from the star wars generation. i also am very intrigued by the jonathon reed case and believe his story. i offer my service to anyone interested in the truth about this subject. the ufo phenomenon is real. the crazy people are the ones who deny we live in a vast ocean of life in this universe. thank you mufon for giving the public a forum to discuss things like my sighting.
content.summary: Two bright lights in unison low to ground moving around schriever afb

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs late on 12/22/09 south on camino tassahara to a middle school.  we had just started back toward home (north) and i noticed a very bright orange sphere, appx. 10 feet dia., above me to my left.  it was flying slowly at about 200 feet.  the speed was no more than 50 mph but stayed at that rate of speed throughout.  there were no other colors (no red and green to indicate wings).  it was traveling west.  i took off with the dogs down a side street to follow it and watched it in decent until a house blocked further view.  it was no more than 1/4 mile from me and made no sound at all.  after it was out of view, i stayed a few minutes longer to see if it changed its direction and would come back into view.  it didn't.  i started back toward camino tassahara to resume my walk.  shortly after turning around, i heard a car come up behind me at a fast pace, then pull over and stop about 100 feet back.  i continued about 300 yards more before turning left on camino tassahara.  the car with headlights on was still sitting there when i turned.  i left on my walk at 9pm, and arrived home at 11pm.  i lost an hour as this particular 3.5 mile walk, which i regularly do, generally takes us a little less than an hour.  i have since checked google earth and there is nothing in the area of decent, just a very large undeveloped area.  the following night, a helicopter was circling the area.  the object in no way resembled a helicopter.
content.summary: Orange sphere traveling slowly, west low over houses; time lost

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on ny17 east towards the ramapo toll station. i saw an unusually bright white light in the sky that seemed to be maybe about 1/2 mile away. i stared at it for a minute or so and it did not seem to move and the lights did not dim at all, at first i thought maybe it was the front lights of an airplane because it was so bright. i continued driving and noticed that it had started moving towards the mountains, within maybe 5-6 seconds it must have moved what looked like almost 50 miles ( can't be exact ). to give a reference since the distance may be off. before the object was moving the size of the light was almost the same size as the moon, after about 2 seconds the light was less than half that size and another few seconds it was a tiny speck, then it was gone. there were no clouds obstructing my view of it and it was not going into/through any clouds either. if this was a plane it was really fast. it was not making any turns, just a straight line till it was out of sight.
content.summary: Incredibly bright white light int he morning before the sun came up, took off at incredible speed from standstill

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw the object i thought it was a star.  it wasn't moving.  then it began to pick up speed which was much faster then an aircraft.

the object moved se from my position n. of buena vista, co.

the object did not have red or green/blue position lighting on the wings or strobe lights.  

the object had a magnitude of a primary star which was n. of the object and east of me.  

the estimated distance was 10 miles and altitude of 10-15 thousand.  the object disappeared quickly as it descended behind a mountain.  it was not a meteor.  

i am a retired corporate pilot.  this is the second report i have filed since 2000.

view my last report - reported: 8/24/2000 13:39
posted: 3/21/2003
location: vail, az
content.summary: White sphere

content.detailedDescription: i live in a two story farm house outside of pocomoke city in a rural area with my wife,nieace,and three childern.My wife was at work, my nieace was outside with the dogs, and i was busy getting the kids ready for bed when my nieace ran inside and yelled for me to come downstairs and look outside.We both stood and watched as an enormus glowing red ball of light crossed the field in front of us and came to an instant stall overtop the treeline on the other side of the field. the object seemed to be almost oval in shape and was pulsating redish light. my dogs took off and darted across the field towards the object as it droped like a stone out of the sky.My nieace and i were both terrified, i told her to go inside with the childern. i grabbed a flashlight and reluctantly went to cross the field calling out for my dogs but before i reached the edge of the field they both came running back. i went inside and locked up the house. i told my wife about it when she came home, she wasn,t suprised because of somthing we both wittnesed not far from here a few years before.
content.summary: Seen above tree line behind house

content.detailedDescription: Green fireball decending under cloud cover only illuminated for 1 second when it was in a  mild downward arc. no noise. saw near i4 and 275 interchange. i thought i was close but there was no sound of impact if it was a meteorite. it was more dark bright green.
content.summary: Green fireball

content.detailedDescription:
This strange event occurred in the kitchen... i was making a sandwitch and i was sure to look at the time... it was 12:29 pm... so in the middle of making lunch nothing seemed to have occurred...But it was 2:00 pm after making the sandwitch .... again looking at the clock... 5 minutes at the most went by in my subjective time... but a hour and a half went by objectively... hence missing time

i've had many other occurances besides that also...Such as telekinesis, teleportation, actually seeing a gigantic ufo and so forth... this stuff has really effected me on many levels... good and bad. not being able to talk to others about this stuff has impacted me emotionally and intellectually...
content.summary: Mainly missing time during this period

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back to valparaiso, from work, at approximately 7:00 p.M.  the road i was on, meridian, is not well lit, and i could see planes and stars in the sky.  i noticed a very large object from afar, that looked like lights on a big plane.  however, as i continued my drive south, then turned east onto 700, i noticed that it was fairly close to rooftops,(perhaps 40-60 feet above) and was not moving!  i slowed down as much as i could with traffic coming behind me, so i could look at this object.  i thought certainly it was an airplane or a helicopter.  however, it was not moving, had lights like a plane, that were white and red, but not blinking as airplane lights would be, and when i rolled down my car window, there was no sound. also, it appeared to be triangular in shape, and perhaps 30-40 feet across. it is hard to judge size due to it being dark outside, and i was in a moving car. i had seen airplanes farther away, which i could tell were planes, because they were moving.  as this area is in the flight pattern to the east of chicago, i thought this had to be an airplane.  i couldn't possibly be seeing a ufo.  i didn't tell anyone of this sighting, as i was certain it had to be an airplane.  but i still could not reconcile in my mind, why it was not moving!  i wish i had stopped and gotten out of my car, but i told myself it had to be an airplane. what made me post this story, was seeing the pictures on mufon, that were submitted on 12-22, by someone in ca, from a sighting in october.  when i opened up the first picture tonight, i said to myself, that is what i saw!!!!  i have never seen anything like this before.  i was not scared at all, just perplexed. the object did not move, but i lost sight of it because i kept driving away from it.
content.summary: Thought it was an airplane, but it wasn't moving.  was motionless in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went to town to see the lighting of the christmas tree on november 27th, 2009. i got a new 2.8 lens and wanted to take some photos in a low light setting. i shot about 100 photos that evening from about 5:00 p.M. to around 8:00 p.M. the next day when i was uploading them to my computer i noticed some lights in the sky of one of them. when i zoomed in i saw a shape with the lights that intrested me, and that i didn't know what it was. i begain to look through my other photos and i found simular lights and shapes in 2 other photos. all 3 photos with the lights and shapes in question in the sky were while i was standing on front street facing west. i had taken 4 photos that evening from that same area, facing west, and those same lights are in 3 of them. (i did not find these lights, or anything like them in any of my other photos i took any place else that night.) of the 4 i took facing west, the photo they were not in was the first one i took, about 5:00 p.M. the first two where they were was taken about 5:40 p.M. by the clock in one of the photos. the third one that the lights were in was taken about 6:00- 6:15 p.M. i really know nothing more about these. i took them to tv 7/4 to see if anyone there was intrested and mark shelette contacted me a few days later and told me to file a report with you.
content.summary: Noticed lights and shape in 3 of my photos when uploading them the next day.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were watching television and she looked out the patio sliding glass door to the north and saw a large light. she asked me what it was and without looking i said "it's a ufo". my wife became very excited and said "no you need to look at this" so i did. we both went out on the patio and looked up at about a 20 degree angle and enountered a bright white light with a red hue in the middle. i told the wife to get the camera and after going through a couple of different rooms she came outside with our sony digital camera. by then the lights were very close and very low and not one light but ten lights. there were six white on top in a horizontal row with four red below and six white on the third row all horizontal and evenly spaced. we could hear a faint mechanical sound as it passed over our heads about 75 to 100 yards above us at a slow rate of speed. i took three pictures as the lights passed but each one showed only two faintly white lights apart from each other in all three photos. i am not very good with a computer or digital cameras so since we had little to no proof we did not tell anyone other than our immediate family and friends. i showed the pictures to the family and they laughed but still believed we saw someting. the other day i was showing the pictures to one of my sons friends and he asked me to brighten the picture and when i did several more lights came into the picture. the immage still is not what we actually witnessed so i have no answer for what is there. the object passed over us from north to south very slowly and very low and the lights were very large with a span of over 300 feet. we could not see the outline of anything else but we could hear a faint mechanical sound. please zoom in and brighten these pictures and let me know what you think.
thanks
content.summary: Bright white light with red center as it came closer.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home from morgantown, i was turning right onto 625 at 6:51pm and i saw 2 elliptical lights significantly larger than stars and really low to the ground. they got my attention because they were low and really big and did not resemble a star in any way. their shapes were not like stars and the second object's color was not that of a star either. they were really bright and a bit distracting. they seemed to be stationary and located just beyond the church across the street's steeple. (i do not know the name of the church) i turned left and continued to look at these objects and they seemed not to move, for 3 minutes i continued looking and when i turned to look back, they had disappeared. the objects were, like i said, elliptical (oval) and they were 2 different colors. the oval on top was a bright white and the second was a golden orange color underneath. i would consider myself a skeptic, so i decided not to do anything about it until i went back around the same time at a later date. i called my boyfriend just after i looked and saw the 2 objects had disappeared and he told me to report it right away, but like i said, i'm skeptical so i wrote down the details on my phone in case what i saw was not there when i returned. the next evening i returned at 6:50pm and saw nothing, so i went back on sunday evening and again-nothing. i thought maybe it was a satellite but there were 2 objects of different colors, a significant distance between them, and were fairly low to the ground. not as low as a house, but a lot lower than an airplane. i tried to take a picture at the stop sign, but the camera on my phone isn't the greatest and didn't capture the lights.
content.summary: 2 elliptical lights, one white and one golden/orange, white above the other, low to ground

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside when my 1 year old looked up and pointed at what appeared to be a jet flying from north to south. i noticed that i didnt see any wings so i got my binoculars. the craft did not have any visible wings, it was silver and was about as long as a 747 jet, it also left no smoke trail or did not make noise. it was traveling approximately as fast as a jet would. 
the weirdest thing about it was that about 3-5 minutes later i noticed a jet coming through very close to the same flight path. i could see that it was a jet because it left a very visible smoke trail. the really weird thing is that the jet was accompanied by another one of these same objects! they seem to be flying together. i wanted to report it but i didnt know who to call. i wasnt sure if it might have been a space shuttle because i know the wings on them are quite smaller but when i went to the nasa site i didnt see any planned activity listed for that day. i just wondered if you might know what this could have been. i have 3 witnesses who seen it.
content.summary: Object spotted with no wings

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out for the evening when i saw the bright light southeast of where i live. at first it was a bright star but when it moved from left to right, i knew it was not a star. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, cause there is a tree branch from where i was viewing. i went to the front of my house and from there i knew this was not a star but a flying object. i only looked for a few minutes than gone to bed.
content.summary: Bright star like but different colors appeared like sparkles

content.detailedDescription: My brother phoned me that he was seeing something weird in the sky while he was driving to his girlfriends fathers house for dinner. he asked if i could go outside to see if i could see it from my house. i went onto my back porch and looked in the direction that he indicated. it was due east apparently over the city of hamel. there were 3 orbs or spheres pulsating in a triangle formation, the did not move but just sat in the same spot. the orbs were pulsating light, and all 3 were in sequense with the others. after one would brighten the others would do so as well in succesion. they remained in same spot for 3-4 mins from the beginning of me seeing them.. after 3 mins they all dissappeared at the same time. i have seen multiple other stange objects in the skies around my house, and i truely believe this to be a hot spot. total sightings in this area by myself is 7 to 8 different objects, spread over 2 years. have seen most activity in last 3 months.
content.summary: 3 spheres in tiangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from my mobile home park.
i was driving my truck.
 i turn right on steekee road.
i notice a light that looked like a star.
 it was ahead of me to the left
i keep looking at the star.
 then all of a sudden it started to come
toward my truck.
 then the object stopped and  hovered.
the object was about 200 feet from my truck 
 it looked the size of a basketball 
it was a yellow whites color.
 i almost  stopped my truck.
 when the object was coming toward my truck.
 the object took off backward and disappeared .
 i did not see it again,  after it took off backwards and disappeared  behind the hill.
 it could not have been a star.
  a star don't do things like that 
                here another one of my ufo sighting 
                i thought i would share. 
                 you can believe or not believe its up to you
content.summary: I was on my way home from my mobile home park a ball of light came toward my truck and stopped

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my job in the predawn on interstate 280 approximately two to three miles west of the 280-80-72 interchange. i was the only vehicle visible in the area when a bright white light filled the cab of my pickup. the next thing i was aware of was  a very bright,focused column of light in my rear view mirror that almost immediately went out. i was also aware that there was a set of tail lights several hundreds of yards ahead of me that were not there the moment before. i have told this to a view friends and was dismissed as being full of it.  i had no ill feelings at the time nor any time since. i only wish to know what happened. i do not believe that we are not alone, i know it for a fact! i have had other unexplainable sightings in my life but never one so close, so apparently intimate.   there is nothing i can add to this, i just want someone who won't think i am nuts to know.
content.summary: Drove into and out of light column with apparent time loss.

content.detailedDescription: I saw two lights travelling south they crossed the path off a passenger jet stopping it's tracks.
content.summary: Passenger plane stopped in its tracks
